name: Ghosts 'n traps
description:
You find yourself stuck in a room filled up with ghosts!

The ghosts also happen to be able to modify the floor with their mysterious powers, lifting up blocks and adding traps!

Armed with a shortsword, try to survive the best you can!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Controls:

WASD: Move.

Space: Roll. (You can roll over blocks if you time it right)

LMB: Attack.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Power-ups:

Sword: Increases damage dealt.

Shield: Increases maximum health.

Potion: Restores health.
